name: Abundant Global
tag_list: oil--gas, tanker, vessel, storage, b2b, e-commerce
description: oil & gas tanker storage B2B platform
overview: Abundant Global is an investment holding company focused on Oil & Gas infrastructure investments, including B2B e-commerce platform for shipping, logistic & storage transactions, lease and trade business, engineering as well as contract works. The company also provides tanker leasing, maintenance and refurbish services, as well as owning and operating land and coastal storage. The company main investments focus is in South East Asia, with strong business presence in San Francisco CA (USA) Middle East and China.
